summary: Patches for Skyrim Child Overhaul and NPC adding mods such as Interesting NPCs and Inconsequential NPCs
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][b][u]About SCO and the Patches[/u][/b][/size][/center][size=3]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62676/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D62676%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Hallgarth's Skyrim Child Overhaul (SCO)[/url] is a mod witch overhauls the look of children NPCs in a way that's more faithful to the original models by Bethesda. Additionaly, SCO creates mer child races (High Elves, Wood Elves, Dark Elves and Orcs) and introduce a few NPCs belonging to these new races at key locations.

Vpulse08 has also made patches for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?]Rigmor of Bruma[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35841/?]Helgen Reborn[/url]. You can find these patches [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82458/?]here[/url].

SCO also offers more freedom in customizing children actors, with more eyes, mouths, noses and hair meshes, as well as eyebrow textures, and support for tint layers similar to adult actors. As with most (if not all) cosmetic race edits, NPCs belonging to the modded races need to have new facegen files generated, otherwise, the infamous gray face bug might occur.

In the particular case of SCO, children not hand eddited by a plugin will also lack the eyebrow textures, because they aren't part of the face textures anymore, otherwise, changing eyebrows would require changing the entire face texture.

This page will host patches between SCO and such mods, hopefuly fixing these problems and providing more cosmetic variety to children not editted by the original SCO, whilst also adhering to its original philosophy of making children look like their parents (when applicable).

When possible, I also intend to create versions using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46156/?]Prince and Pauper[/url] replacer plugins for said patches, in a way similar to the patches made to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55555/?]RS Children[/url] (not compatible with SCO, by the way). The screenshots have Prince and Pauper Installed with a lower priority than SCO, but the outfits weren't hand-picked for each NPC, yet.

Given that SCO hasn't been updated for compatibility with the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71214/?]Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch (USLEP)[/url], I also uploaded replacer plugins for SCO. Note that you'll still need the assets (everything but the plugins) from the original SCO, which, as a bonus, we'll also give you the opportunity to endorse Hallgarth's great work.

The list of covered mods and patches is as follows (more will be added as these patches are created, feel free to suggest mods to be patched):

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8429/?]Interesting NPCs[/url] - Edits children NPC, giving them appropriate SCO headparts, contains Facegen files witch should replace the originals.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36334/?]Inconsequential NPCs[/url] - Edits children NPC, giving them appropriate SCO headparts, contains Facegen files witch should replace the originals.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47327/?]Cutting Room Floor[/url] - Edits Froa, a nord child added by CRF to Kynesgrove, giving her the appropriate SCO headparts, contains Facegen files.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37994/?]Falskaar[/url] - Edits the 3 named children NPC, as a well as their test counterparts and an unnamed child, giving them appropriate SCO headparts and outfits. Contains Facegen files witch should replace the originals.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25704/?]Wyrmstooth[/url] - Edits the 2 named children NPC, giving them appropriate SCO headparts and outfits. Contains Facegen files witch should replace the originals.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52397/?]Moon and Star[/url] - Edits Albert, giving him the appropriate SCO headparts. Contains Facegen files witch should overwrite the originals.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41852/?]Aurora Village[/url] - Edits the 2 boys and 2 girls, giving him the appropriate SCO headparts. Contains Facegen files witch should overwrite the originals.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13608/?]Expanded Towns and Cities[/url] - There are 2 files for download regarding this patch, "Skyrim Child Overhaul - ETaC Complete Patch" and "Skyrim Child Overhaul - ETaC Dragon Bridge South Patch". The first one only patches "ETaC - Complete.esp", if you use the ETaC Dragon Bridge South addon, you'll also need the second patch. They should be safe to merge with TES5Edit if you want to save up a plugin slot.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63738/?]Destroy the Entire Dark Brotherhood[/url] - Removes the child flag from BretonRaceChildVampire, making Babette killable, you'll still need the original mod to remove Cicero's essential flag. You DON'T need this patch if you use Non-Essential Children and its SCO patch.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13202/?]Non-Essential Children[/url] - Carries all changes made by NEC over to SCO races (both new and modded). Children'll be kilable (provided they aren't made essential for a quest) and have pickable pockets. You'll require the original mod. Place the patch bellow both NEC and SCOOverhaul.esp. You should also place it bellow SCO Bandit and Forsworn Children.esp if you use it.

[u][b]SCO Bandit and Forsworn Children[/b][/u] - adds a one SCO children (details below) to a few levelled actors lists. They'll randomly (rarely in my testing) replace adult bandits and are supposed to be killable, but cowardly, I'll need to test more and maybe rebalance their stats. The levelled NPC lists altered by the plugin are the same as those touched by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26502/?]Forsworn Chil[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26502/?]dren[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26501/?]Bandit Children[/url] both by spligitmoose (so credit for that goes to him). The lists are as follows:

- SubCharBandit[01 through 05]Melee1H - Nords, Redguards, Imperials and Orcs, both male and female all in SCO fur armor;

- SubCharBandit[01through 05]Magic - Bretons, Dark Elves and Wood Elves, both male and female also in SCO fur armor;

- LCharForsworn[01 through 06]Melee and Missile, both Male and Female - Bretons both male and female, in unreleased SCO forsworn armor made by Hallgarth (included with the SCO bandit and forsworn children package);


[u][b][center]Changelog[/center][/b][/u]
1.1 (2017-01-28)
- Added patch for Aurora Village;

1.1 (2016-03-08)
- Changed various default Child NPCs outfits to better ones added by SCO (3DNPC and Inconsequential NPCs patches);
- Changed child Joselynn's face to better match her adult look (3DNPC patch);
- Added a small patch for Destroy the Entire Dark Brotherhood;
- Added a Beta version of SCO Bandit and Forsworn Children, including the unreleased forsworn armor, boots and headdress conversions made by Hallgarth;
- Added patch for Falskaar;
      - Added patch for Wyrmstooth;
- Added patch for Non-Essential Children;


[b][center][u]Installation[/u][/center][/b]

1. Download and extract [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62676/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D62676%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Skyrim Child Overhaul[/url] to your data folder (preferably, with a mod manager), I also recommend installing the HD textures in the optional files section;

OPTIONAL USLEP COMPATIBITY: Download and extract the replacer plugins in the miscellaneous files section. Let them overwrite SCO plugins (if using Mod Manager, just make sure the mod is below SCO in the left pane);

OPTIONAL PNP OUTFITS:

a. Download and extract the replacer plugin in the optional files section. Let tem overwrite SCO's main plugin;

b. Download and extract [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46156/?]Prince and Pauper[/url] main file (not the RS Children one, although that could work). DO NOT use its plugins! PNP also makes edits to child NPCs wich aren't readily compatible with SCO. If you're concerned about the other clothing textures, check the "Recommended Mods" section bellow, I really think this combination looks better.

2. Download and extract any of the patches you want, letting them overwrite facegen files and loading their plugins after SCO and the respective mod (keep the patches lower in MO left pane).


[b][u][center]Recommended Mods[/center][/u][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63353/?]Rustic Children by Gamwich[/url] - The skin textures are not compatible and the outfit meshes unnecessary with SCO. You can delete or hide everything and keep only the textures\clothes folder as a texture replacer for default children clothing.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69784/?]Rustic Clothing by Gamwich[/url] - These are excellent texture replacers for the vanilla adult outfits. Seeing as most outfits added by SCO share these textures, I really recommend installing these.

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59734/?]Lind's Court Wizard Robes[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36817/?]Lind's Monk Robes Revamp[/url] - Two of the outfits added by SCO (Child Mage Robes and Child Monk Robes) share these textures. Lind also has textures for the other robe variants, making them more distinguished from each other. These textures are (as of 2016-03-03) not covered by Rustic Clothing.


[center][b][u]Credits
[/u][/b][/center]Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit

ElminsterAU, Hlp, Zilav and Sharlikran for TES5Edit

Artmoor and the rest of the Unofficial Patches team

Hallgarth

Kriss Takahashi and the rest of the 3DNPC team

Ripple and the rest of the Inconsequential NPCs team

Dark0ne and the rest of the Nexus team[/size]

files.fileName: Skyrim Child Overhaul - Inconsequential NPCs - Patch-73932-1-1.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Changed child Joselynn's face to better match her adult look (3DNPC patch)
Changed various default Child NPCs outfits to better ones added by SCO (3DNPC and Inconsequential NPCs patches)
Added a new replacer plugin for SCO with outfits from PNP (Dagny's/Nelkir's, Frothar's and Orphan's) giving them to the appropriate NPCs. You'll need the meshes and textures from PNP, but you DON'T need its plugins
Added BETA version of SCO Bandit and Forsworn Children
Added version 1.0 of SCO Falskaar Patch
Added version 1.0 of SCO Non-Essential Children patch
Added version 1.0 of SCO Wyrmstooth Patch
Added version 1.0 of SCO Moon and Star Patch
Added version 1.0 of SCO ETaC Complete patch
Added version 1.0 of SCO ETaC Dragon Bridge South patch
